content: Hi there, we're an innovation group at University Health Network (the largest academic hospital in Canada located in Toronto, Ontario). We're looking for intermediate full stack developer (React/Javascript/Java). We use a HAPI FHIR server as the backbone to several remote patient monitoring applications with clinician and patient client. Take a look at some of the cool innovations: https://ehealthinnovation.org/ and our job posting: https://ca.indeed.com/job/fullstack-developer-02538897a0d74bae
